response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task goal is to heat a pie after unfreezing it. From the observed objects, we can see that the cheese_tart_188 is inside the fridge_dszchb_0 and it is freezable. We can assume that the cheese_tart_188 is the pie we need to heat. The fridge and the oven are more than 2 meters away from the robot, so we need to move the robot closer to interact with them.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Open the oven.
(7) Put the pie in the oven.
(8) Close the oven.
(9) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
